SceneGeometry Properties

Requires: Base Development System

Inherits from Scene»SceneDrawable. View the class hierarchy.

PropertyDescription
Texture Generator ModeReads or writes how the texture coordinates for the geometry generate. Details
Texture Generator S PlaneReads or writes the values that define the s-plane to which you apply the texture. The following equation defines the plane.

Ax+By+Cz+D=0

Details
Texture Generator T PlaneReads or writes the values that define the t-plane to which you apply the texture. The following equation defines the plane.

Ax+By+Cz+D=0

Details
